attributes.action: Prevent the migrant bill from being passed as it is against the un’d policies
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to do this because it is the most humane thing they could do and then the uk would not be committing a offence under the un and the uk’d human rights law
attributes.background: I want the government to prevent the migrant bill from passing as it breaches the un’s human rights and against the humans rights act of 1998, I would also like the government to protect migrants coming from the channel as deporting them to Africa

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634311
